section.title: Adding users to the svn mailing alias
section.p: Optionally, add the user to the alias samicvs in the file /etc/aliases, and run the program newaliases.

section.title: Adding new aliases to /etc/alias and using them in the post-commit hook

ul.li: Make a new alias by adding a new line in /etc/alias in this format aliasname: mailadress1, mailadress2

Copy the last line of the post-commit script, and change the -m argument to a path that is interesting for the given alias and the address to aliasname@localhost. The resulting line should look like this: LC_ALL=se_NO.UTF-8 commit-email.pl "$REPOS" "$REV" -m "<path of interest>" -h "victorio.uit.no" -s langtech aliasname@localhot
